name: Just Date
description:
Dates. Everyone talks about dating. Movies, books, music, and Twitter threads - it's all about dating. But we still know so little about it. What to say to a girl? Why even sit in a café? How to invite her home? And what to do at home?

Just Date is a real dating simulator, and it's up to you to decide how successful the date will be. Try to win the heart of the beautiful girl, Elizabeth. Your confidence and financial situation will help you in this endeavor. But don't forget to have fun yourself!



🍓Take a psychological test to find out your level of confidence and financial situation
🍓Ask interesting questions and tell stories
🍓Pamper your girl with delicious dishes
🍓Tell cringe jokes

Remember that Elizabeth is not an ordinary girl and she will try to surprise you. Be prepared for unexpected stories.

The game has multiple endings, and you will have the opportunity to play through it several times and go on the date in different ways.
